DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study RVSTAR is to evaluate whether echocardiographic criteria exploring the right ventricle can predict the inefficacy and/or the unsafeness of recruitment maneuvers in patients suffering from acute respiratory distress syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Echocardiography Predictive of the Inefficacy and/or of the Unsafeness of Recruitment Maneuvers in Patients With Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome.
